Entries.Introduction: Oh! Well hello there, I don't believe we've ever met before? My name is Anna, I live over by the library with my husband Basil and daughter Mary. Not that I share the same fondness of books as they do.....#$b#Oh! Sorry I'm keeping you aren't I? What was your name again? @?#$b#Well it's very nice to meet you @!$h
Entries.Mon: I wonder if the ladies have any interesting stories from over the weekend? Sasha usually has something interesting.....#$b#Oh! Don't mind me muttering to myself!$h
Entries.Tue: My daughter takes after my husband so much. I'm very proud of her, but sometimes I wish she'd be a little more social like her mother.
Entries.Wed: Basil took off again this morning without touching his breakfast.$s#$b#That man needs to get his nose out of the dirt and join us in the real world once in a while.
Entries.Thu: Sorry, I've gotta have a talk with Manna as soon as I can. It's very important!
Entries.Fri: I wanted to take Mary to Zuzu City to do some shopping today, but she just didn't seem even slightly interested.$s
Entries.Sat: Me and the ladies are trying to think of somewhere to go for dinner. Any recommendations?#$b#I heard the Stardrop Saloon is excellent but way too packed on the weekend.#$b#The three of us wouldn't even have spots to stand!$h
Entries.Sun: Sundays are so relaxing. Even my husband takes them off from his research and study to come and spend the whole day with Mary and I.$h
Entries.spring_12: I haven't decided if I'm going to the Egg Festival yet. I'll ask the ladies to see what they have in mind.
Entries.spring_23: Oh, I just love seeing the girls in their Flower Dance dresses every year. Mary has grown into such a beautiful young woman!$h
Entries.summer_10: You know, you can tell a lot about a person by what they decide to bring for the potluck. What will you be bringing this year?
Entries.summer_27: If my husband researched jellyfish instead of plants, then I might actually find it interesting.#$b#Oops, did I say that out loud?
Entries.fall_15: The Stardew Fair is always as good of a reason as any to go visit Jodi and Caroline.#$e#Gotta catch up with my gal pals!$h
Entries.fall_26: I used to love Spirit's Eve as a girl. Now, even just the thought of all that candy gives me gut rot!
Entries.winter_7: I always love going to see the ice sculptures. That Leah has some real talent!$h#$b#Come to think of it, I should see if she'd sell me one of her pieces sometime.
Entries.winter_24: No matter how old I get, there's always just something so magical about the Feast of the Winter Star.
Entries.Mon2: Have you read any of Basilâ€™s books? There are dozens in the library. He says that the books about this town are more popular than the ones about plants.#$b# I bet he wishes it were the other way around!$h
Entries.Tue2: Sometimes the three of us will go take a hike up Goddess Hill.#$b#I must say, in those moments, I sometimes understand my husband's obsession with nature.$h
Entries.Wed2: Oh, pardon me @. I need to go speak with Sasha as soon as I can#$b#She won't believe this....
Entries.Fri2: Oh, why hello there. Always good to see you @.
Entries.Sat2: I'm happy Ellen got that wheelchair. It's great to see her be able to get around town!$h
Entries.Sun2: So much to get done this coming week!$s#$b#Sorry @, it'll have to wait for now!
Entries.Mon4: What should I do when I get home? Even if Basil ends up being around, he'll no doubt be focused on work.#$b#What a bore.
Entries.Tue4: In the afternoon, all the wives in town gather at the Plaza to gossip about this and that. I truly look forward to catching up with everyone. Basil on the other hand... He only talks about plants.$s
Entries.Wed4: Sasha's husband always seems so exhausted, yet Sasha herself is completely unflappable. I imagine it's hard work running a business.
Entries.Thu4: Don't get me wrong, I love going up to Goddess Hill as much as the next person. But Basil is so hooked on it that it's really begun to lose its luster.#$b#Maybe I should say something, but I hate the thought of hurting his feelings.$s
Entries.Fri4: Have you heard about Lillia's husband, Rod? He went to find a desert flower that only blooms once every ten years to cure what ails Lillia. Honestly, I'm a little jealous Lillia has such a devoted husband, but she's been very lonely without him.#$e#Perhaps I shouldn't have told him about that flower...$s
Entries.Sat4: My husband is always sneaking off to the Inn for evening libations.#$b#Bit of a freewheeling sort of man, isn't he?
Entries.Sun4: Eggs.....Milk.....Curry Spice.....#$b#Ooops! Sorry there @. I forgot to write down a few things that Mary needed me to grab while I'm out, so I can't be distracted right now!
Entries.Mon6: Oh, why hello dear. Don't mind me, I'm just trying to think of meal prepping ideas for the week.#$b#It saves me so much time!$h
Entries.Tue6: My daughter, Mary, got valedictorian three years in a row!$h#$b#She's probably more intelligent then myself and her father combined.
Entries.Wed6: I should try convincing Basil to go to Cindersap Forest more often.#$b#Then at least I can tag along to Pelican Town for a change of scenery.
Entries.Thu6: When we go to Goddess Hill as a family, I have to admit that there's something mystifying about the place.#$b#Have you noticed anything like that?
Entries.Sat6: If I convince my husband that Ginger Island is the place to go for interesting flora, do you think he'll plan a family trip there?#$b#That would be wonderful, don't you agree, @?$h
Entries.Sun6: When I was growing up, I never thought I'd be a housewife living in a library.#$b#Not that I regret any decisions. Life just has a funny way about it like that.#$b#I'm sure you can agree, being thrown into farming and all.
Entries.Mon8: I know I complain about my husband sometimes, but then I just think about Jodi and Lillias's positions and I really begin to cherish what I've got.
Entries.Tue8: I strongly appreciate Joja Marts' low prices.#$b#If they decide to open up a location here in Mineral Town, they'll have my support!
Entries.Wed8: Us ladies should go on a shopping trip over in Zuzu City.#$b#I'm a city girl myself, if you didn't know. Sometimes, the solitude out here gets a little....deafening.
Entries.Thu8: Mary's been applying to colleges in the city.#$b#Maybe I should apply as well. We could be roommates!$h
Entries.Fri8: I don't really know what to do with myself today, @.#$b#Do you have any recommendations?#$b#Maybe you can take be monster slaying in the mines with you!$h
Entries.Sat8: I've been forcing myself to try and get more into my husband's research.#$b#Now that I've given it a chance, it really is pretty interesting stuff!$h#$b#I have to say, I'm extremely proud of him.$h
Entries.Sun8: Oh, hello there dear. I've noticed that you've been helping out around the town more often than usual lately.#$b#On behalf of everyone, I just want to thank you!$h#$b#You truly are a peach!$h'
Entries.Mon10: Having a husband that's a published author is something most wives could only imagine.#$b#And to think, my daughter wants to follow that same path!#$b#Soon, we'll have two celebrities in the family!$h
Entries.Tue10: I've been taking the time to organize all the books in the library.#$b#Some of them seem really interesting, perhaps I'll crack one of them open sometime!
Entries.Wed10: The ladies run a fitness group over in Pelican Town once a week.#$b#I considered joining, but maybe I should start one of our own here in Mineral Town.#$b#That would surely give me plenty to do with my time!$h
Entries.Thu10: The food at the Moonlight Inn truly is top tier.#$b#Now, if only I can convince Doug to give up his recipes.
Entries.Fri10: I hear they're planning on making a new road to Forget-Me-Not Valley soon!#$b#That should give my day some variety!$h
Entries.Sat10: Know what, @? I really respect you for uprooting and coming here to take care of the old farm.#$b#I'm sure it wasn't the first thing that came to mind for a career, but you've made the most of it. And it's certainly paid off!$h
Entries.Sun10: My husband asked me the other day if we could go on a date night.$l#$b#He truly is still just as sweet as the man I once married.$l
Entries.Resort: Oh things on Ginger Island are simply divine!$h#$b#Are you enjoying yourself dead? I know it's very different here from the city or Pelican Town, but you truly fit in like a natural!$
